contents: Article 23 (Executives) ① City/provincial sports councils shall have the following executives. Revised 2017. 4. 3., 2019. 12. 20., 2021. 10. 6., 2022. 5. 10. 1. 1 president 2. 9 vice-presidents or less (professional sports, daily sports, school sports, women Efforts must be made to include at least one person representing sports) 3. 15 to 50 directors (including the president, vice president, and secretary general) 4. 3 auditors ② The executives of the city/provincial sports association shall be appointed by the relevant city/provincial sports council. ·A person cannot concurrently hold other executive positions at the Provincial Sports Council. ③ The upper limit of the number of directors set in Paragraph 1, Item 3 may be increased to 20 or less by resolution of the general meeting of the city/provincial sports association. Newly established 2020. 7. 29., 2021. 10. 6.
